column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Two monks from Wat Than were injured in an acid attacks carried out by unknown men.------The attack on the  monks occurred at 1:50 pm on July 2
column5: along Norodom Boulevard in Sangkat Tonle Bassac
column6: Chamkarmon.------The monks aged 21 and 22 were injured on the head
column7: neck and chest.------According to a source  four monks were travelling in a tuk-tuk from the pagoda in order to study at Preah Suramarit High School
column8: when suddenly two suspects riding a motorcycle threw acid at them. The other two were unharmed because of acid hit the side of the tuk tuk.------Police are now checking CCTV. ------Kohsantepheap
